articles.description: The fast bowler picked up her second four-for in T20Is before the opening batter hit her 26th half-century in the format
articles.content: ReportThe fast bowler picked up her second four-for in T20Is before the opening batter hit her 26th half-century in the format

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: AUS give Bairstow a taste of his medicine for cheeky ‘See ya later, Smudge’ dig - Hindustan Times
articles.description: On Sunday it was Australia’s turn to return the favour and they didn't miss out on it. | Cricket
articles.content: The ongoing Ashes series has witnessed plenty of chirping from both sides. A similar exchange was caught on the stump mic on Day 4 of the third Ashes Test at Headingley, Leeds as the hosts found them… [+1570 chars]
